main.name: Andrew Palo
main.description: - welcome to my virtual resume! I have a unique passion for developing creative solutions to complex challenges and I have a unique affinity for learning. These traits have brought me significant success in many different technical areas.
main.bio: My demonstrated academic success, my affinity for learning across a wide range of technical areas, and my interest and experience in software development may make me an excellent fit for fulfilling your software development needs. If you find my skill set to be in line with your needs, please contact me at your convenience.

resume.skillmessage: I have significant professional/amateur experience with the following concepts/technologies:

education.description: Summa Cum Laude, Honors Research Distinction

description.bullet: - Design and develop web applications for processing cybersecurity data from thousands of users, endpoints, and applications
- Utilize modern technologies and frameworks such as React.js, Java, Spring Boot, MS SQL Server, and Oracle DB to build efficient and maintainable software
- Worked closely with a plurality of business units to protect the company, its critical systems, and sensitive information from digital attacks
- Drafted several patent applications for inventions utilizing groundbreaking technologies in the following fields: semiconductor device structure/fabrication and broadband cellular networking (5G)
- Maximized effectiveness of patent protection by drafting detailed yet broad claims
- Conducted effective interviews with USPTO Patent Examiners to expedite application allowance
- Prepared several responses to communications received from the USPTO, such as office actions and appeal briefs
- Collaborated with in-house patent counsel for Fortune 500 companies, both in the US and abroad
- Oversaw firmwide database outlining expected days of work and expected billings to optimize work item allocation
- Strategized and developed several Microsoft Office VBA macros for automating various aspects of patent prosecution
- Developed applications for organizing/displaying automated testing results and kept detailed documentation
- Built frontend UI in Vue.js and fetched test results from AWS S3 Buckets in backend using Java and Spring Boot
- Utilized Git for version control and created a build and deploy plan to ensure CI/CD pipeline was followed
- Maintained and updated company hotlinks page using Angular and TypeScript
- Worked alongside Scrum Master and Architects to lead scrum team through daily agile ceremonies
- Automated large-scale server processes by writing reusable scripts in PowerShell, saving months of brute-force labor
- Built, maintained, and decommissioned servers using tools such as VMWare, SCOM, SCCM, AD, and DNS
- Managed endpoint security and incident response programs on servers for PCI compliance purposes

projects.title: Kalman Filter for Noise Reduction in UAVs using Echoic Flow
Human miRNA miR-675 inhibits DUX4 expression and may be exploited as a potential treatment for FSHD
Perfect Song Twitter Bot
projects.category: Bot programmed to tweet a perfect song every 6 hours including: artist, title, a corresponding link, and significant lyrics.

testimonials.text: Andrew demonstrates his maturity by making sure he understands the big picture and work breakdown before taking actions. He came up to speed [with new challenges] quickly and was able to use his newly acquired knowledge to create valuable software.
